articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: iPhone customers upset by Apple Wallet ad pushing ‘F1’ movie - TechCrunch
articles.description: However well-received the film may be, iPhone users don't necessarily want their built-in utilities, like their digital wallet, marketing to them.
articles.content: Apple customers aren’t thrilled they’re getting an ad from the Apple Wallet app promoting the tech giant’s original film “F1 the Movie.” Acrosssocialmedia, iPhone owners are complaining that their Wa… [+2510 chars]
